items.item:
For some reason, if we import(XML) in the NAMESPACE and add XML to the Imports in the DESCRIPTION, R CMD check fails with messages of the form
<Error: package/namespace load failed for 'R2GoogleMaps' Call sequence: 2: stop(gettextf("package/namespace load failed for '%s'", package), call. = FALSE, domain = NA) 1: library(package, lib.loc = lib.loc, character.only = TRUE, verbose = FALSE) Execution halted
create javascript function given a name, code and parameters.
Specify the map object and the controls.
